long_description: Our Novara Presta tubes fits a variety of 700c tire sizes for easy replacement-700 x 23 - 25 size features innovative, protective Tube2Go(TM) compostable shrink-wrapped packaging. Please note: Tube2Go shrink-wrapping is currently limited to the 700 x 23 - 25 size. No need to toss a cardboard box-700 x 23 - 25 tube comes shrink-wrapped in compostable packaging film made from renewable plant resources. The protective film reduces packaging by 98% and keeps the tube compact and protected until you need it. Just place the Tube2Go tube in your saddle-bag or bike-pack and go, it's that simple and easy. Partially threaded valve has a threaded lower half to help keep the valve aligned, secure and rattle-free against your wheel's rim. Smooth upper half of valve enables a bike pump's head to seal securely around the valve without damaging the pump head's gasket. 700 x 35 - 43 size has a fully threaded valve. Please note: tubes work with Presta-compatible rims only and have a 48mm Presta valve. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Our Novara Presta tubes fits a variety of 700c tire sizes for easy replacement-700 x 23 - 25 size features innovative, protective Tube2Go(TM) compostable shrink-wrapped packaging.
